hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Abbas: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: If anyone asks (you) for refuge for the sake of Allah, give him refuge; and if anyone asks you (for something) for the pleasure of Allah, give him. Ubaydullah said: If anyone asks you for the sake of Allah

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَسْتَعِيذُ مِنَ الرَّجُلِ
chapter.eng-name: When one man seeks the refuge of another
